summary: If the water of your forge looks like frozen jelly, this mod is for you
descriptionHtml:
This is a merge of all the plugins of the original mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18818/?]Blacksmithforge water fix[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1008258/?][b]RolloLG[/b][/url], wich provided a solution for players whose blacksmith forge water looked like frozen jelly.

If you have all dlc and need this fix you could install this mod instead of the 4 plugins required by the original

All credits go to RolloLG who created the original mod.
author: msmelero
